txt.en: 'During their assault, the Corsairs captured citizens from town and ship to serve aboard their galleys as slaves. Although we were able to halt their advance into Gondor, many remain trapped aboard their vessels.\n\n'We no longer have the proper resources to mount a rescue, so I would ask for you to board the remaining Corsair-occupied ships, and free any prisoners of war that you find.'
Thandor, the Gondorian Captain, can be located in the market east of Tol Ciryarani.\n\nYou should speak with Thandor.
Thandor has asked you to board the Corsair ships, and free the remaining slaves.

'Well done, [placeholder].

'Although this will leave many displaced refugees within our walls, this means fewer innocents being subjugated by the enemies of Gondor.

'Our next move is to make sure they find their way to some place that's safer. We won't be able to keep them here.'
Freed slaves aboard the Corsair ships ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Free slaves aboard the Corsair ships ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Corsair ships can be reached using the boat to the south of Thandor.\n\nYou should board the Corsair ships and free the captured slaves.
